wikipedia_page.main: Alistair James Magowan (born 10 February 1955) is a British retired Anglican bishop. He served as the Bishop of Ludlow — the sole suffragan bishop of the Church of England Diocese of Hereford — from 2009 until his 2020 retirement.

response: * Alistair Magowan, later Bishop of Ludlow, was curate here 1984–9.
